name: Solar Foods
description: a single-cell protein - from water, CO2 and electricity. It doesn’t require arable land or irrigation and isn’t limited by climate conditions. The original concept of Solein was born from a NASA space programme, and was further developed in the research projects of the Technical Research Centre of Finland Ltd and the Lappeenranta University of Technology (LUT).

name: Orbital Systems
description: initially developed for space - available to consumers.

name: ClimateTechList
description: curated list of ~50 climatetech companies, specific to software engineers, with descriptions of each company, their software impact, and climate impact.

name: Breakthrough Energy Ventures
description: Venture fund backed by Bill Gates and a group of private investors, with more than $1 billion in committed capital, to build companies that will help stop climate change.

name: Clean Tech Finland
description: Hub of Finnish clean tech companies.

name: Clean Tech Sweden
description: Hub of Swedish clean tech companies.

name: r/ClimateActionPlan
description: A subreddit for giving people hope when facing climate change.

name: Climate Choice
description: A non-profit project that contains actionable guides on reducing climate change, as well as educational information about climate change.

name: Mattermore.io
description: Newsletter highlighting companies using AI & data science to reverse climate change; useful for discovering new initiatives/work opportunities, delivered every week.

name: Norrsken Foundation
description: Swedish foundation which supports and invests in organizations that have a positive impact on society.

name: Environmental Protection Agency
description: Research on effects of climate change and solutions.

name: Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change
description: United Nations body for assessing the science related to climate change.

name: Mercator Research Institute on Global Commons and Climate Change
description: Providing solution-oriented policy pathways for governing the global commons to enhance sustainable development and human well-being.

name: NASA climate
description: Vital signs of the planet, facts, and solutions.

name: U.N Climate Change National Inventory Submissions
description: This contains country specific climate reports from several U.N countries. It has data from 2003 onwards.
